Requirements You are wielding a single one-handed melee weapon and hold nothing else in your hands.

Using your weapon as a lever, you force your opponent to end up right where you want them. Make a Strike with a one-handed melee weapon. If the Strike hits, you can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Reposition] the target up to 10 feet. You can move the target through your space during this movement. Your Strike gains the following failure effect.

Failure You can force the creature to move as you would on a success, but you can move the target only 5 feet.
